TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AuthenticationServiceManager extends System.Object

summary.span: 設定驗證服務之自訂實作的位置。

span.span: Configures the location of a custom implementation of the authentication service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會對應到屬性或控制項。The class corresponds to the property of the or control. 驗證 Web 服務是啟用 AJAX 的應用程式用來登入和登出用戶端指令碼。The authentication Web service is used by AJAX-enabled applications to log on and log off from client script. 您可以使用提供替代的實作的驗證而不是使用內建的 Web 服務的 ASP.NET AJAX 功能所提供的 Web 服務的路徑。You can use to provide the path of an alternative implementation of the authentication Web service instead of using the built-in Web service that is provided by the AJAX features of ASP.NET. 若要使用的驗證服務應用程式中，您必須在組態檔中啟用它。To use the authentication service in your application, you must enable it in the configuration file. 如果您使用內建驗證 Web 服務，您沒有明確宣告服務管理員驗證頁面上。If you use the built-in authentication Web service, you do not have to explicitly declare the authentication service manager on the page. 若要建立您自己的驗證服務，您必須實作的 Web 服務，有兩種方法：`Login`和`Logout`。To create your own authentication service, you must implement a Web service that has two methods: `Login` and `Logout`. 此外，這些方法需要的內建驗證 Web 服務相同的簽章。In addition, these methods require the same signature of the built-in authentication Web service. 下列範例會顯示必須在自訂驗證 Web 服務類別中實作的基本類別結構。The following example shows the basic class structure that must be implemented in a custom authentication Web service class. 若要使用自訂驗證 Web 服務，您可以新增服務以宣告方式在標記中包括``元素內``元素在頁面上，如下列範例所示。To use a custom authentication Web service, you can add the service declaratively in markup by including an `` element inside the `` element on the page, as shown in the following example. ``` ``` 您可以也以程式設計方式設定以使用自訂驗證 Web 服務。You can also programmatically configure to use a custom authentication Web service. 不論是否驗證服務的宣告式區段在頁面上，啟用則會驗證服務組態檔中，則啟用 AJAX 應用程式將轉譯的頁面中包含的 ECMAScript (JavaScript) 變數.Regardless of whether the declarative section for the authentication service is on the page, if the authentication service is enabled in the configuration file, then AJAX-enabled applications will include an ECMAScript (JavaScript) variable in the rendered page. 這可讓用戶端指令碼，以判斷目前使用者是否已驗證。This allows client script to determine whether the current user is authenticated.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Path { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定驗證服務的路徑。

span.span: Gets or sets the path of the authentication service.

value.span: 自訂驗證 Web 服務的路徑。

span.span: The path of the custom authentication Web service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未設定屬性，則傳回值是。If the property is not set, then the return value is . 在 ASP.NET AJAX 功能，將會在此情況下，然後使用內建的驗證對應至下列的內部預設路徑的 Web 服務: ~ / ScriptServices_AuthenticationService.asmx。In this case, the AJAX functionality in ASP.NET will then use the built-in authentication Web service that corresponds to the following internal default path: ~/ScriptServices_AuthenticationService.asmx. 如果您設定，就會發生相同的行為為空值或`null`。The same behavior occurs if you set to an empty value or `null`. 中可以指定控制項或在相關聯控制項。 can be specified in the control or in an associated control. 當在設定適用於層級，請注意下列事項：When is set at the level, the following caveats apply: - 如果在控制項階層架構中，有多個 proxy就不必在每個 proxy 執行個體上設定。If there are multiple proxies in the control hierarchy, does not have to be set on each proxy instance. - 如果已明確地設定 proxy 執行個體上，值必須是相同的所有其他 proxy 明確設定此屬性。If is explicitly set on a proxy instance, the value must be the same for all other proxies on which this property is explicitly set.

exception.span: 在控制階層架構中指定了一個以上的唯一路徑。

span.span: More than one unique path was set in the control hierarchy.
